user.title: Sunlight Visualizer Configuration
user.description: Configure the Sunlight Visualizer integration. Current Home Assistant location: {location_name} ({latitude:.6f}, {longitude:.6f})

data.use_custom_angle: Use custom angle (instead of compass direction)
data.direction: Compass direction (used if custom angle is OFF)

data_description.use_custom_angle: Check to enter exact angle, uncheck to select compass direction
data_description.direction: Select compass direction (N, NE, E, etc.) - only active when custom angle is OFF
data_description.roof_direction: Select which side of the house the roof slopes down toward
data_description.roof_power_entity: Select a power sensor to show below roof % (W/kW)
data_description.roof_power_enabled: Show roof power value under the roof %
data_description.roof_power_invert: Invert power values (useful if sensor is negative)
data_description.auto_rotate_speed: Default auto-rotate speed for the card (1-90 deg/sec)
data_description.house_angle: Angle of your house's front relative to North (0-359°)
data_description.ceiling_tilt: Tilt angle of ceiling/solar panels (0° = flat, 90° = vertical)
data_description.update_interval: How often to recalculate sun position (1-60 minutes)

error.invalid_latitude: Latitude must be between -90 and 90 degrees
error.invalid_longitude: Longitude must be between -180 and 180 degrees
error.invalid_house_angle: House angle must be between 0 and 360 degrees
error.invalid_ceiling_tilt: Ceiling tilt must be between 0 and 90 degrees
error.invalid_update_interval: Update interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes
error.invalid_auto_rotate_speed: Auto-rotate speed must be between 1 and 90 deg/sec
error.invalid_force_sun_azimuth: Force Sun Azimuth must be between 0 and 359 degrees
error.invalid_force_sun_elevation: Force Sun Elevation must be between -90 and 90 degrees
error.invalid_coordinates: Please enter valid decimal numbers for coordinates
error.direction_required: Please select a compass direction when custom angle is not used

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Sunlight Visualizer is allowed.

set_options.name: Set options
set_options.description: Update Sunlight Visualizer options for the active config entry.

entry_id.name: Config entry ID
entry_id.description: Optional. If omitted, the first Sunlight Visualizer entry is used.

roof_direction.description: Side where the roof slopes down.
